# VirtualScroller.scrollToIndex() method

Scroll to item index

**Signature:**

```typescript
scrollToIndex(index: VirtualScrollerExactPosition, smooth?: boolean, attempts?: number): void;
```

**Returns**

void

## Remarks

Calls [scrollToOffset](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.scrolltooffset) with calcuated offset until desired scroll position is reached.
